
#line 4
vec4 xlat_main( in vec2 uv, in vec4 color ) {
    #line 6
    vec4 c;
    c = color;
    c.xy += uv;
    return c;
}
varying vec2 xlv_TEXCOORD0;
varying vec4 xlv_COLOR;
void main() {
    vec4 xl_retval;
    xl_retval = xlat_main( vec2(xlv_TEXCOORD0), vec4(xlv_COLOR));
    gl_FragData[0] = vec4(xl_retval);
}
